com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.eclipse

Class AbstractActivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.core.runtime.Plugin
      • org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin
        • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.eclipse.AbstractActivator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Activator

    public abstract class AbstractActivator
extends org.eclipse.ui.plugin.AbstractUIPlugin
    The class AbstractActivator is a default implementation of easy creation of Acrolinx Java SDK Eclipse plug-ins. To get started override getAcrolinxEclipsePluginInitilizer().

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.eclipse.core.runtime.Plugin

      • createAcrolinxEclipsePlugin

        protected AcrolinxEclipsePlugin createAcrolinxEclipsePlugin()
        Creates the GUI Eclipse plug-in. Override this method and create your own inherited implementation of AcrolinxEclipsePlugin to change the default behavior.
        Returns:
        a new instance of AcrolinxEclipsePlugin
